title: General Question: How to use Corrupting Potion well?
body:
So, supp main here trying different lanes. A lot of the champs I like to play need a corrupting pot to start off with. When should I use it in lane? Should I use it in lane when initiating, or when I'm backing off? And also, when should I sell it to replace with other stuff?
{{item:2033}} {{item:2033}} {{item:2033}} {{item:2033}} {{item:2033}} {{item:2033}} {{item:2033}}

replies.body:
I've never seen any support take corrupting potion. It's usually for top or mid laners that need sustain. To use it optimally you usually want to use it when

A. You have already traded once
B. Are about to trade
you drink it when you need to tower dive trust.
